description.value: Couture jewelry is often produced in extremely limited runs, and the most expensive pieces are one-of-a-kind creations for wealthy clients. Wearing couture jewelry grants a +1 circumstance bonus on Charisma-based checks to influence creatures who are aware of the value of the items, as determined by the GM. If you are also wearing couture clothing, the bonuses stack. The price given is for one piece of jewelry. Bonuses from wearing more than one piece of jewelry do not stack.

modifiers.name: Jewelry, couture
modifiers.notes: Wearing couture jewelry grants a +1 circumstance bonus on Charisma-based checks to influence creatures who are aware of the value of the items, as determined by the GM. Bonuses from wearing more than one piece of jewelry do not stack.
